description: HDFC credit card e-mandate auto payment (Google Play)

input.subject: View: Account update for your HDFC Bank A/c
input.bodyText: Dear Customer, Greetings from HDFC Bank! Your Google Play - App Purchase Services bill, set up through E-mandate (Auto payment), has been successfully paid using your HDFC Bank Credit Card ending 2742. Transaction Details: Amount: INR 99.00 Date: 27/01/2026 SI Hub ID: XwjOXZVGvP To manage your e-Mandates, please visit: https://www.sihub.in/managesi/hdfcbank Thank you for banking with us.
